response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high value to you, we believe it's a perfect match for your requirements. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. We hope you find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
